title: Der Kleine Zodiac
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, International, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Located in the city center in an ordinary residential house that has been designed to look like a jungle with green plants and wooden accessories. For the interiors and the menu the owners have chosen zodiacs as a theme. Mostly a take-away place with a few tables and serves primarily pizza, lasagna, pasta. Note: next door is their other restaurant, Zodiac, which is more of a sit-down place.
